briefTitle: An Initial Safety Study of Gedatolisib Plus PTK7-ADC for Metastatic Triple-negative Breast Cancer
officialTitle: An Initial Safety Study of Gedatolisib Plus PTK7-ADC for Metastatic Triple-negative Breast Cancer
conditions: Triple Negative Breast Cancer, Metastatic Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Safety of Gedatolisb + PTK7-ADC using NCI CTCAE v4.0
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Metastatic Triple-negative Breast Cancer
* Willingness to undergo tumor biopsy
* Patients must have received at least 1 prior chemotherapy regimen for metastatic disease

Exclusion Criteria:

* Previous treatment with mTOR inhibitor
* Untreated brain metastases
